div.p: Y.S. and Z.A. designed the study and performed the fieldwork. Q.Y., M.C., P.A.-M. and A.B. conducted the sensitivity experiments and analyzed the modeling results. Y.S., L.L., H.C. and Y.L. participated in loess drilling and sampling. S.C. and W.L. contributed to carbonate isotope analysis. Z.A., X.Q., Q.L. and H.Z. analyzed the paleomagnetic data. L.Z., G.D., M.L. and W.Z. conducted the 26Al/ 10Be burial dating. All authors contributed to discussion, interpretation of the results, and writing of the manuscript.
